content.description: Begin left of the low roof at a high jug.  A few big moves through big holds gives way to easier climbing over good stone until a final tricky move skirting a bulge to the anchors.  Beware of falling rock as there is a rap station above this route.
content.location: Left of small corner roof, route directly beneath space station rap anchors

content.description: This one still needs a bit of cleaning down low, though it's much better than it was.  Climb 5.5 terrain placing gear in hidden slots/cracks.  At a ledge gain a really nice layback crack to the anchors.
content.location: Far left of main Escape room wall before the rock turns a corner.

content.description: Very moderate climbing leads to a ledge.  From here a fun crux using good feat gets you over a small bulge where anchors (that are just a bit two low) will greet you at a stance.
content.location: Starts just right of a tree a little left of the line left of "Up and Out"

content.description: Really Easy face climbing follows a wandering crack to a ledge about mid-height.  A very pretty crack awaits you for the second half of the route, but a secret code is needed to start moving forward to the chains beneath the block at the top.
content.location: Mid-wall on the main escape room crag.  a pretty orange crack high on route makes this climb easy to identify.

content.description: Who knew there was a route here?  Grey Face with edges and ripples.
content.location: Second route left of roof corner

content.description: A good climb for beginners.  Climb on good enough hands and feet forcing you to practice good climbing rock over technique
content.location: After Rapping over "Up and Out" go climber's right around the corner up a small hill to a low angled face.

content.description: The Escape Room is a smallish crag of mainly moderate climbs that can be found about midway along the prospector trail.   It's routes are shorter and shaded on great sandstone.   The real beauty of The Escape Room is the fact that there are a few routes (Up & Out) that you can easily top out and belay up a second.  Once on the top you are directly beneath Pinnacle Rock and only about 3 minutes from the parking lot.  You can also rap in to this crag from the Pinnacle "Space Station" which gives you fast access to middle prospector routes, business time, and the River Trail.  There is much more development that could be done here.
